I did not go MAX this year, but I have enjoyed reading the coverage this year. Ray Camden reports on his blog that ColdFusion 8 is getting image support. Here are some of thedetails listed on his blog.

Resizing (in various ways) Pasting images over each other Adding text to an image CAPTHA (of various levels of difficulty) base64 encoding images Works with Blogs (lets you store images in databases) Read Exif/IPTC metadata Basic drawing functions (line, rectangle, curves)

frontmatter.title: ColdFusion 9 Beta out now on Adobe Labs
